column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners
#Text=Many sons and daughters have dreaded coming home from either school or work because of the inevitable family dinner conversations .
#Text=Who knows , you might end up next to your great-aunt Kate who blabs on and on about her cats or next to cousin Joey who rightfully earned his title of prank king .
#Text=Read this article to have an easier time , and you might find yourself enjoying these dinners !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Review the Seating
#Text=Consider whether there is some rivalry in the family .
#Text=Or , do some people just not fit together ?
#Text=If that is the case , make sure they sit on opposite sides of the table !
#Text=Try to steer the mood towards being a happy one .
#Text=Who likes to chat with a nemesis for a whole night ?
#Text=Also , it might turn out to be dangerous ...
#Text=Sit in a comfortable environment .
#Text=Put yourself next to friends and people you have no problem being yourself with .
#Text=Have a corner for children .
#Text=It 's very annoying when little kids bug you for the whole dinner , so make sure that they have toys to play with and other kids to scream with .
#Text=Always Have an Escape
#Text=Plan the escape .
#Text=Inevitably , there are the casualties , so make sure that if you end up with a very boring or annoying person as your side person , that you have an escape .
#Text=Some ideas are offered next , to help you .
#Text=Fake a call .
#Text=You can say that your friend is in a homework crisis , or be even less confidential and simply say it 's important .
#Text=Say you want to check on your 3-year-old cousin , or in certain cases , your son .
#Text=Kids are a great diversion from family dinners , because they need so much care and attention .
#Text=Watch out though , you might find yourself spending the rest of the night with little Johnny !
#Text=Use the restrooms .
#Text=If you desperately need to go to the bathroom , nobody could force you to stay .
#Text=Just make sure you do n't stay away for too long .
#Text=Bring Another Person in the Conversation
#Text=If you are having trouble keeping the conversation going , include someone else .
#Text=Group chats can be so much easier and enjoyable , because you can just lay back and listen ( or not ) .
#Text=Being properly engaged
#Text=Make eye contact .
#Text=Many people expect you to be making eye contact , so do that .
#Text=Stand up straight .
#Text=This basically shows the person respect .
#Text=Do n't be the one to end the conversation if you do n't have a proper excuse .
#Text=The person might come back later and wo n't give up until you 've heard it all .
#Text=Be funny .
#Text=It is so much more enjoyable to talk to a funny person !
#Text=Make jokes and laugh when necessary , but make sure you do n't overdo it .
#Text=Laugh even when you do n't get the joke , it makes people feel appreciated .
#Text=Be a good audience .
#Text=Nod when you have to , cry when you have to , and even yell if necessary !
#Text=The talker needs a confidence booster to keep his or her story interesting on both sides .
#Text=Be polite .
#Text=Do n't interrupt unless the speaker asks you a question .
#Text=Find a good topic to talk about .
#Text=It 's so much easier to speak if both parties are interested and involved in the conversation .
#Text=Do n't be negative .
#Text=Do n't try to see everything at a bad angle , it makes the environment worse for you and the other guests .
#Text=Try to enjoy yourself , and most of the time you will .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Be yourself !
#Text=Do n't brag about something that 's not true , because it 's hard to keep up a lie with your family .
#Text=Plus , nobody judges or hates you at family dinners , it 's your family !
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't be too loud or evasive .
#Text=Do n't draw too much attention to yourself , but not too little either , it 's rude in both ways .
